tags.name: LoanAccounts
tags.description: Allows you to retrieve, create, update, delete loan accounts and it also allows to execute some other actions like state changing, undo a refinance, undo a reschedule, reject, withdraw or close of a loan account and also undo reject, undo withdraw and undo close.

get.summary: Allows retrieval of a single loan account via id or encoded key

parameters.name: loanAccountId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the loan account

parameters.name: detailsLevel
parameters.description: The level of details to retrieve, FULL means the full details of the object will be retrieved (custom fields, address, contact info or any other related object), BASIC will return only the first level elements of the object

parameters.name: loanAccountId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the loan account

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Loan account to be updated

parameters.name: loanAccountId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the loan account

patch.summary: Partially update an existing loan account

parameters.name: loanAccountId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the loan account

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patch operations to be applied to a resource

post.summary: Allows to pay off a loan account

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Key that can be used to support idempotency on this POST. Must be a valid UUID(version 4 is recommended) string and can only be used with the exact same request. Can be used in retry mechanisms to prevent double posting.

parameters.name: loanAccountId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the loan account

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Allows specifying the input for loan account pay off

102.description: Your idempotent request was already submitted and is currently being processed, try again later.

post.summary: Allows to undo reschedule a loan account

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Key that can be used to support idempotency on this POST. Must be a valid UUID(version 4 is recommended) string and can only be used with the exact same request. Can be used in retry mechanisms to prevent double posting.

parameters.name: loanAccountId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the loan account

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Allows specifying the action details for a loan account

102.description: Your idempotent request was already submitted and is currently being processed, try again later.

post.summary: Allows to change the interest rate for a loan account

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Key that can be used to support idempotency on this POST. Must be a valid UUID(version 4 is recommended) string and can only be used with the exact same request. Can be used in retry mechanisms to prevent double posting.

parameters.name: loanAccountId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the loan account

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Allows specifying the action details for a loan account

102.description: Your idempotent request was already submitted and is currently being processed, try again later.

get.summary: Allows retrieval of loan accounts using various query parameters. It's possible to look up loans by their state, branch, centre or by a credit officer to which the loans are assigned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination, index to start searching at when retrieving elements, used in combination with limit to paginate results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Pagination, the number of elements to retrieve, used in combination with offset to paginate results

parameters.name: paginationDetails
parameters.description: Flag specifying whether the pagination should be enabled or not. Please note that by default it is disabled (OFF), in order to improve the performance of the APIs

parameters.name: detailsLevel
parameters.description: The level of details to retrieve, FULL means the full details of the object will be retrieved (custom fields, address, contact info or any other related object), BASIC will return only the first level elements of the object

parameters.name: creditOfficerUsername
parameters.description: The username of the credit officer to whom the entities are assigned to

parameters.name: branchId
parameters.description: The id/encodedKey of the branch to which the entities are assigned to

parameters.name: centreId
parameters.description: The id/encodedKey of the centre to which the entities are assigned to

parameters.name: accountState
parameters.description: The state of the loan account to search for

parameters.name: accountHolderType
parameters.description: The type of the account holder: CLIENT/GROUP

parameters.name: accountHolderId
parameters.description: The id of the account holder

Items-Limit.description: Pagination details, the requested page size

Items-Offset.description: Pagination details, the index of the first returned item

Items-Total.description: Pagination details, the total available items

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Key that can be used to support idempotency on this POST. Must be a valid UUID(version 4 is recommended) string and can only be used with the exact same request. Can be used in retry mechanisms to prevent double posting.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Loan account to be created

102.description: Your idempotent request was already submitted and is currently being processed, try again later.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Key that can be used to support idempotency on this POST. Must be a valid UUID(version 4 is recommended) string and can only be used with the exact same request. Can be used in retry mechanisms to prevent double posting.

parameters.name: loanAccountId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the loan account

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Allows specifying the action details for a loan account

102.description: Your idempotent request was already submitted and is currently being processed, try again later.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Key that can be used to support idempotency on this POST. Must be a valid UUID(version 4 is recommended) string and can only be used with the exact same request. Can be used in retry mechanisms to prevent double posting.

parameters.name: loanAccountId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the loan account

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Allows specifying the action details for a loan account

102.description: Your idempotent request was already submitted and is currently being processed, try again later.

predefinedFeeEncodedKey.description: The encoded key of the predefined fee

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the custom predefined fee, auto generated, unique.

amount.description: The amount of the custom fee.

CustomPredefinedFee.description: The custom predefined fees, they may be used as the expected predefined fees that will be applied on the disbursement.

accountState.description: The state of the loan account

prepaymentSettings.description: The prepayment settings details of the loan.

migrationEventKey.description: The migration event encoded key associated with this loan account. If this account was imported, track which 'migration event' they came from.

lastSetToArrearsDate.description: Date when the loan account was set to last standing, or null if never set (as Organization Time)

notes.description: Extra notes about this loan account.

daysInArrears.description: The number of days in arrears

accountSubState.description: This field holds a second state for the account. Beside the account state, we might need to hold sometimes a different information to actually represent the correct life-cycle step in which the account is at that moment. The account behaves as the main state implies, but it  can have either some limitations either some extra behavior rules. For example, even if the account is Active, it can also be Locked in the same time which impliessome limitations over the actions which can be performed with the account.

loanName.description: The name of the loan account.

interestSettings.description: The interest settings details for this loan.

assets.description: A list of assets associated with the current loan account

lastInterestReviewDate.description: The last interest review date. Indicates the date the interest was reviewed last time. Stored as Organization Time.

id.description: The id of the loan, can be generated and customized, unique

assignedUserKey.description: Key of the user this loan is assigned to

futurePaymentsAcceptance.description: Shows whether the future payments are allowed or not for this account (repayment transactions with entry date set in the future)

originalAccountKey.description: Key of the original rescheduled/refinanced account

lockedOperations.description: A list with operations which are locked when the account is in sub-state AccountState.LOCKED.

accruedInterest.description: The accrued interest. Represents the amount of interest that has been accrued in the account.

accruedPenalty.description: The accrued penalty, represents the amount of penalty that has been accrued in the account.

creationDate.description: The date this loan account was created

assignedCentreKey.description: Key of the centre this account is assigned to

tranches.description: A list of disbursement tranches available for the current loan account.

approvedDate.description: The date this loan account was approved

lastTaxRateReviewDate.description: The last tax rate review date. Indicates When/if the account had last tax rate checked (as Organization Time).

interestFromArrearsAccrued.description: The interest from arrears accrued. Represents the amount of interest from arrears that has been accrued in the account.

scheduleSettings.description: The schedule settings details for this loan.

paymentMethod.description: The payment method. Represents the interest payment method that determines whether the payments are made Horizontally (on the Repayments) or Vertically (on the Loan Account)

accountHolderKey.description: The encodedKey of the client (a.k.a account holder)

latePaymentsRecalculationMethod.description: Overdue payments recalculation method copied from the loan product on which this account is based

fundingSources.description: A list of funds associated with the current loan account

accountHolderType.description: The type of the account holder (i.e CLIENT)

arrearsTolerancePeriod.description: The arrears tolerance (period or day of month) depending on the product settings

lastInterestAppliedDate.description: The last interest applied date. Indicates when/if the account had last interest applied (stored to interest balance) (as Organization Time)

rescheduledAccountKey.description: Key pointing to where this account was rescheduled/refinanced to. only not null if rescheduled

activationTransactionKey.description: The encoded key of the transaction that activated this account

assignedBranchKey.description: Key of the branch this loan account is assigned to. Loan account's branch is set to unassigned if no branch field is set

balances.description: Balances details for this loan account

creditArrangementKey.description: The key to the line of credit where this account is registered to.

interestCommission.description: The value of the interest booked by the organization from the accounts funded by investors. Null if the funds are not enable

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the loan account, auto generated, unique

lastAccountAppraisalDate.description: When/if the account had last been evaluated for interest, principal, fees and penalties calculations (as Organization Time)

penaltySettings.description: The penalty settings details of the loan.

settlementAccountKey.description: The encodedKey of the settlement account

lastModifiedDate.description: The last date the loan was updated

principalPaymentSettings.description: Defines the settings for Revolving Credit principal payments

lastLockedDate.description: Holds the date when the account was set for the last time in the LOCKED state. If null, the account is not locked anymore. Stored as Organization Time

closedDate.description: The date this loan was closed

productTypeKey.description: The key to the type of product that this account is based on.

allowOffset.description: Specify if the account is allowing offset links.

guarantors.description: A list of guarantees associated with the current loan account

LoanAccount.description: Represents the amount that your organization lends to a customer. An account associated to a borrower with terms and conditions defined by a loan product. In a loan account Mambu stores all the information related to disbursements, repayments, interest rates and withdrawals.

zip.description: The ZIP code of the location in which the card acceptor has the business.

country.description: The country in which the card acceptor has the business.

city.description: The city in which the card acceptor has the business.

street.description: The street in which the card acceptor has the business.

name.description: The name of the card acceptor.

state.description: The state in which the card acceptor has the business.

mcc.description: The Merchant Category Code of the card acceptor.

CardAcceptor.description: The details of the card acceptor (merchant) in a transaction hold.

monthlyToleranceDay.description: Defines monthly arrears tolerance day value.

nonWorkingDaysMethod.description: Shows whether the non working days are taken in consideration or not when applying penaltees/late fees or when setting an account into arrears

tolerancePeriod.description: Defines the arrears tolerance period value.

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the arrears base settings, auto generated, unique.

AccountArrearsSettings.description: The account arrears settings, holds the required information for the arrears settings of an account.

transactionDetails.description: Details for the transactions to be logged for Pay Off action

notes.description: Extra notes for Repayment transaction logged for Pay Off action

LoanAccountPayOffInput.description: Allows specifying the input for loan account pay off

interestRateReviewUnit.description: The interest rate review unit. Defines the interest rate update frequency measurement unit.

interestRate.description: The interest rate. Represents the interest rate for the loan account. The interest on loans is accrued on a daily basis, which allows charging the clients only for the days they actually used the loan amount.

interestRateSource.description: The interest rate source. Represents the interest calculation method: fixed or (interest spread + active organization index interest rate)

interestApplicationMethod.description: The interest application method. Represents the interest application method that determines whether the interest gets applied on the account's disbursement or on each repayment.

interestChargeFrequency.description: The interest change frequency. Holds the possible values for how often is interest charged on loan or deposit accounts

interestType.description: The possible values for how we compute and apply the interest

accrueInterestAfterMaturity.description: The accrue interest after maturity. If the product support this option, specify if the interest should be accrued after the account maturity date.

interestBalanceCalculationMethod.description: The interest balance calculation method. Represents the option which determines the way the balance for the account's interest is computed.

interestSpread.description: Interest to be added to active organization index interest rate in order to find out actual interest rate

interestCalculationMethod.description: The interest calculation method. Holds the type of interest calculation method.

interestRateReviewCount.description: Interest rate update frequency unit count.

accrueLateInterest.description: Indicates whether late interest is accrued for this loan account

InterestSettings.description: The interest settings, holds all the properties regarding interests for the loan account.

gracePeriod.description: The grace period. Represents the grace period for loan repayment - in number of installments.

periodicPayment.description: The periodic payment amount for the accounts which have balloon payments or Reduce Number of Installments and Optimized Payments

repaymentScheduleMethod.description: The repayment schedule method. Represents the method that determines whether the schedule will be fixed all over the loan account's life cycle or will be dynamically recomputed when required.

paymentPlan.description: A list of periodic payments for the current loan account.

shortMonthHandlingMethod.description: The short handling method. Determines how to handle the short months, if they select a fixed day of month > 28. Will be null if no such date is selected and also for the Interval methodology. Only available if the Repayment Methodology is FIXED_DAYS_OF_MONTH.

repaymentInstallments.description: The repayment installments. Represents how many installments are required to pay back the loan.

gracePeriodType.description: The grace period type. Representing the type of grace period which is possible for a loan account.

principalRepaymentInterval.description: The principal repayment interval. Indicates the interval of repayments that the principal has to be paid.

hasCustomSchedule.description: Flag used when the repayments schedule for the current account was determined by the user, by editing the due dates or the principal due

repaymentPeriodUnit.description: The repayment period unit. Represents the frequency of loan repayment.

fixedDaysOfMonth.description: Specifies the days of the month when the repayment due dates should be. Only available if the Repayment Methodology is FIXED_DAYS_OF_MONTH.

scheduleDueDatesMethod.description: The schedule due dates method. Represents the methodology used by this account to compute the due dates of the repayments.

repaymentPeriodCount.description: The repayment period count. Represents how often the loan is to be repaid: stored based on the type repayment option.

defaultFirstRepaymentDueDateOffset.description: The default first repayment due date offset, indicates how many days the first repayment due date should be extended(all other due dates from the schedule are relative to first repayment due date - they will also be affected by the offset)

ScheduleSettings.description: The schedule settings, holds all schedule properties.

loanPenaltyCalculationMethod.description: The last penalty calculation method, represents on what amount are the penalties calculated.

penaltyRate.description: The penalty rate, represents the rate (in percent) which is charged as a penalty.

PenaltySettings.description: The penalty settings, holds all the fields regarding penalties

amount.description: The amount used by the client for the guaranty

depositAccountKey.description: The key of the deposit account used by the guarantor (populated when the guaranty type is GUARANTOR). It can be null.

assetName.description: The name of a value the client guarantees with (populated when the guaranty type is ASSET)

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the entity, generated, globally unique

id.description: Investor fund unique identifier. All versions of an investor fund will have same id.

guarantorKey.description: The key of the client/group used as the guarantor.

sharePercentage.description: Percentage of loan shares this investor owns

InvestorFund.description: Contains the details about an investor fund including fields like encoded key, guarantor type, amount and guarantor key

toInstallment.description: The installment's position up to which the PMT will be used

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the periodic payment, auto generated, unique.

amount.description: The PMT value used in periodic payment

PeriodicPayment.description: For fixed term loans there is the possibility to define a payment plan. A payment plan consists of multiple periodic payments. This class holds information about a periodic payment.

includeInterestInFloorAmount.description: Boolean flag, if true, the interest will be included along with the principal in the repayment floor amount, for a revolving credit account

totalDuePayment.description: The method of total due payment for revolving credit

amount.description: Fixed amount for being used for the repayments principal due.

principalFloorValue.description: The minimum principal due amount a repayment made with this settings can have

principalPaymentMethod.description: The method of principal payment for revolving credit.

percentage.description: Percentage of principal amount used for the repayments principal due.

includeFeesInFloorAmount.description: Boolean flag, if true, the fees will be included along with the principal in the repayment floor amount, for a revolving credit account

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the principal payment base settings, auto generated, unique.

totalDueAmountFloor.description: The minimum total due amount a repayment made with this settings can have

principalCeilingValue.description: The maximum principal due amount a repayment made with this settings can have

PrincipalPaymentAccountSettings.description: The principal payment account settings, holds the required information for the principal payment process of an account.

transactionDetails.description: The input details for the disbursement transaction

expectedDisbursementDate.description: The date of the expected disbursement.Stored as Organization Time.

fees.description: List of fees that should be applied at the disbursement time.

firstRepaymentDate.description: The date of the expected first repayment. Stored as Organization Time.

disbursementDate.description: The activation date, the date when the disbursement actually took place.

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the disbursement details, auto generated, unique

DisbursementDetails.description: The the disbursement details it holds the information related to the disbursement details as disbursement date, first repayment date, disbursement fees.

amount.description: The amount used by the client for the guaranty

depositAccountKey.description: The key of the deposit account used by the guarantor (populated when the guaranty type is GUARANTOR). It can be null.

assetName.description: The name of a value the client guarantees with (populated when the guaranty type is ASSET)

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the security, auto generated, unique.

guarantorKey.description: The key of the client/group used as the guarantor.

Guarantor.description: Guarantor, holds information about a client guaranty entry. It can be defined based on another client which guarantees (including or not a savings account whether it is a client of the organization using Mambu or not) or based on a value the client holds (an asset)

path.description: The field to perform the operation on

from.description: The field from where a value should be moved, when using move

value.description: The value of the field, can be null

PatchOperation.description: A single change that needs to be made to a resource

amount.description: The amount used by the client for the guaranty

depositAccountKey.description: The key of the deposit account used by the guarantor (populated when the guaranty type is GUARANTOR). It can be null.

assetName.description: The name of a value the client guarantees with (populated when the guaranty type is ASSET)

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the security, auto generated, unique.

guarantorKey.description: The key of the client/group used as the guarantor.

Asset.description: Asset, holds information about a client asset entry.

action.description: The action type to be applied

notes.description: The notes related to the action performed

LoanAccountAction.description: Allows specifying the action details for a loan account

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the entity, generated, globally unique

internalTransfer.description: Whether the transaction was transferred between loans or deposit accounts

transactionChannelKey.description: The encoded key of the transaction channel associated with the transaction details.

transactionChannelId.description: The id of the transaction channel associated with the transaction details.

targetDepositAccountKey.description: In case of a transaction to a deposit account this represent the deposit account key to which the transaction was made.

LoanTransactionDetails.description: Contains the details about the loan transaction including fields like encoded key, transaction channel key and channel id.

interestFromArrearsPaid.description: The interest from arrears paid, indicates total interest from arrears paid into the account.

principalDue.description: The principal due, indicates how much principal it's due at this moment.

interestBalance.description: The interest balance. Represents the total interest owned by the client, from now on (total interest accrued for account - interest paid).

holdBalance.description: The sum of all the authorization hold amounts on this account.

principalPaid.description: The principal paid, holds the value of the total paid into the account.

penaltyDue.description: The penalty due. Represents the total penalty amount due for the account.

feesBalance.description: The fees balance. Represents the total fees expected to be paid on this account at a given moment.

penaltyBalance.description: The penalty balance. Represents the total penalty expected to be paid on this account at a given moment.

redrawBalance.description: The total redraw amount owned by the client, from now on.

interestFromArrearsBalance.description: The interest from arrears balance. Indicates interest from arrears owned by the client, from now on. (total interest from arrears accrued for account - interest from arrears paid).

principalBalance.description: The total principal owned by the client, from now on (principal disbursed - principal paid).

interestDue.description: The interest due. Indicates how much interest it's due for the account at this moment.

penaltyPaid.description: The Penalty paid. Represents the total penalty amount paid for the account.

feesPaid.description: The fees paid. Represents the total fees paid for the account.

interestFromArrearsDue.description: The interest from arrears due. Indicates how much interest from arrears it's due for the account at this moment.

feesDue.description: The fees due. Representing the total fees due for the account.

interestPaid.description: The interest paid, indicates total interest paid into the account.

interestRate.description: The new interest rate to be available on the account

valueDate.description: The date when to change the interest rate (as Organization Time)

notes.description: The notes for the change interest rate action performed on the loan account

ChangeInterestRateLoanAccountInput.description: Represents the request payload for performing an interest rate change action

transactionChannelId.description: The id of the transaction channel associated with the transaction details.

transactionChannelKey.description: The encoded key of the transaction channel associated with the transaction details.

TransactionDetails.description: Contains the details about transaction including fields like transaction channel key and channel id

notes.description: The notes for the action performed on the loan account

LoanActionDetails.description: Allows specifying the action details for an action performed on a loan account

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the transaction details , auto generated, unique.

amount.description: The amount this tranche has available for disburse

disbursementDetails.description: The disbursement details of this tranche

LoanTranche.description: In some cases organizations may approve loans but not disburse the full amount initially. They would like to spread the disbursement (and risk) over time. Likewise for the client, they may not need the full loan amount up front. They may want to have a loan to buy some equipment for their business but will make one purchase today and another purchase in a few months.  In these cases, they don't need the full amount and wouldn't want to pay interest on cash they don't need yet. A solution for this matter is the usage of disbursement in tranches. This class holds the information required for one of this tranche.

elementsRecalculationMethod.description: The elements recalculation method, indicates how the declining balance with equal installments repayments are recalculated.

principalPaidInstallmentStatus.description: Installment status for the case when principal is paid off (copied from loan product).

prepaymentRecalculationMethod.description: Prepayment recalculation method copied from the loan product on which this account is based.

applyInterestOnPrepaymentMethod.description: Apply interest on prepayment method copied from loan product on which this account is based.

PrepaymentSettings.description: The prepayment settings, holds all prepayment properties.

expectedDisbursementDate.description: The date when this tranche is supposed to be disbursed (as Organization Time)

disbursementTransactionKey.description: The key of the disbursement transaction logged when this tranche was disbursed. This field will be null until the tranche disbursement

TrancheDisbursementDetails.description: The disbursement details regarding a loan tranche.

referenceToken.description: The reference token of the card

Card.description: A card which can be associated to an account (deposit / loan). Cards consist only in card references (tokens). Card details are not stored by Mambu.

amount.description: The amount of money to be held as a result of the authorization hold request.

advice.description: Whether the given request should be accepted without balance validations.

cardToken.description: The reference token of the card.

externalReferenceId.description: The external reference ID to be used to reference the account hold in subsequent requests.

originalAmount.description: The original amount of money to be held as a result of the authorization hold request.

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate for the original currency.

encodedKey.description: The internal ID of the authorization hold, auto generated, unique.

userTransactionTime.description: The formatted time at which the user made this authorization hold.

originalCurrency.description: The original currency in which the hold was created.

currencyCode.description: The ISO currency code in which the hold was created. The amounts are stored in the base currency, but the user could have enter it in a foreign currency.

AuthorizationHold.description: An authorization hold entry as a result of a hold action performed by a card acceptor.

feesPaid.description: The fee amount to be paid for Pay Off action

penaltyPaid.description: The penalty amount to be paid for Pay Off action

interestPaid.description: The interest amount to be paid for Pay Off action

PayOffAdjustableAmounts.description: Adjustable amounts to be paid for Pay Off action
